name: Boom Robots! - Ground Battles Multiplayer Robots
name_original: Boom Robots! - Ground Battles Multiplayer Robots
description:
Futuristic robots replaced humanity and the machine's life went on. They are Boom Robots!

Now battle with friends in this multiplayer, frantic, interesting battle game! Enjoy fierce battles machine versus machine versus player versus enemy! Become the royal king of this battle! 

Colorful graphics, dynamic gameplay and countless tactics ensure the best multiplayer game ever! Enjoy our battlefield! See the change! See the world that is moving towards technology! 

Game features:

- Classic versus robot battles!
- Low-poly stylized graphics!
- Fancy Battles!
- A beautiful, hostile world!
- Multiplayer battles anywhere in the world!
- 8 different robots!
